On the basis of the silicon elements and copper parts as connectors, as well as the usage of iron for contamination of the silicon wafer, I managed to create a universal processing unit.
With correct outer controlling, my primitive processor can go through algorithms and perform many different calculations.

Processors possess 1 critical property: Their capacity (§lcore§r), which indicates the maximum load (refer to chipset/memory) the processor can handle before it begins to heat up. When the temperature exceeds 1000C it'll go kaput!
